Package accounts.bank.managing.thesis.bachelor.rastvdmy.service

Class BankLoanServiceTest

java.lang.Object
accounts.bank.managing.thesis.bachelor.rastvdmy.service.BankLoanServiceTest
@ExtendWith(org.mockito.junit.jupiter.MockitoExtension.class) public class BankLoanServiceTest extends Object
This class is used to test the functionality of the BankLoanService class. It uses the Mockito framework for mocking dependencies and JUnit for running the tests.

  • Method Details

    • setUp

      @BeforeEach public void setUp()
      This method is used to set up the test environment before each test method is executed. It initializes the test objects with appropriate values.

    • testGetAllLoans

      @Test public void testGetAllLoans()
      This method tests the functionality of the getAllLoans method in the BankLoanService class. It verifies that the method returns all loans in the repository.

    • testFilterAndSortLoans

      @Test public void testFilterAndSortLoans()
      This method tests the functionality of the filterAndSortLoans method in the BankLoanService class. It verifies that the method returns a page of loans sorted and filtered according to the provided Pageable object.

    • testGetLoanById_Exists

      @Test public void testGetLoanById_Exists()
      This method tests the functionality of the getLoanById method in the BankLoanService class. It verifies that the method returns the correct loan when a valid ID is provided.

    • testGetLoanById_NotFound

      @Test public void testGetLoanById_NotFound()
      This method tests the functionality of the getLoanById method in the BankLoanService class. It verifies that the method throws an exception when an invalid ID is provided.

    • testGetLoanByReferenceNumber_Success

      @Test public void testGetLoanByReferenceNumber_Success()
      This method tests the functionality of the getLoanByReferenceNumber method in the BankLoanService class. It verifies that the method returns the correct loan when a valid reference number is provided.

    • testGetLoanByReferenceNumber_NotFound

      @Test public void testGetLoanByReferenceNumber_NotFound()
      This method tests the functionality of the getLoanByReferenceNumber method in the BankLoanService class. It verifies that the method throws an exception when an invalid reference number is provided.

    • testAddLoanToCard_InvalidCard

      @Test public void testAddLoanToCard_InvalidCard()
      This method tests the functionality of the addLoanToCard method in the BankLoanService class. It verifies that the method throws an exception when an invalid card ID is provided.

    • testAddLoanToCard_BlockedCard

      @Test public void testAddLoanToCard_BlockedCard()
      This method tests the functionality of the addLoanToCard method in the BankLoanService class. It verifies that the method throws an exception when a blocked card ID is provided.

    • testOpenSettlementAccount_InvalidUser

      @Test public void testOpenSettlementAccount_InvalidUser()
      This method tests the functionality of the openSettlementAccount method in the BankLoanService class. It verifies that the method throws an exception when an invalid user ID is provided.

    • testOpenSettlementAccount_InvalidLoanRange

      @Test public void testOpenSettlementAccount_InvalidLoanRange()
      This method tests the functionality of the openSettlementAccount method in the BankLoanService class. It verifies that the method throws an exception when an invalid loan range is provided.

    • testOpenSettlementAccount_BlockedUser

      @Test public void testOpenSettlementAccount_BlockedUser()
      This method tests the functionality of the openSettlementAccount method in the BankLoanService class. It verifies that the method throws an exception when a blocked user ID is provided.

    • testRepayLoan_Success

      @Test public void testRepayLoan_Success()
      This method tests the functionality of the repayLoan method in the BankLoanService class. It verifies that the method correctly updates the loan amount and repaid loan amount.

    • testUpdateLoanDate_Success

      @Test public void testUpdateLoanDate_Success()
      This method tests the functionality of the updateLoanDate method in the BankLoanService class. It verifies that the method correctly updates the start and expiration dates of the loan.

    • testUpdateLoanDate_InvalidDateRange

      @Test public void testUpdateLoanDate_InvalidDateRange()
      This method tests the functionality of the updateLoanDate method in the BankLoanService class. It verifies that the method throws an exception when an invalid date range is provided.

    • testDeleteUserLoan_Success

      @Test public void testDeleteUserLoan_Success()
      This method tests the functionality of the deleteUserLoan method in the BankLoanService class. It verifies that the method correctly deletes a user's loan when the loan is fully repaid.

    • testDeleteUserLoan_LoanNotFullyRepaid

      @Test public void testDeleteUserLoan_LoanNotFullyRepaid()
      This method tests the functionality of the deleteUserLoan method in the BankLoanService class. It verifies that the method throws an exception when the loan is not fully repaid.
